post.author: 임기순
post.content:
Currently our client have a full time position for a Weblogic Administrator. Please see attached job description for this position and if it's suitable for you, update your resume and send us back in MS Word format as well your salary expectation and years of experience against each requirement. Company's location - Oakville.
Sincerely yours,
Rita Serebryany, Director, IT Consulting services BTA INC., tel:416-6634090, Fax:416-6634166 email: btainc@rogers.com
post.title: Weblogic Administrator
